summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Human Resources, authorizing the applications for and execution of agreements with the United States Department of Health and Human Services for the operation of a program to prevent sexual abuse of children and a program to computerize tracking of elderly clients receiving case management services, increasing expenditure allowances in the 1985 Budget of the Department of Human Resources, creating a position and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Human Resources Operating Fund.
